hadith.arabic-text: وقال ابن بكير حدثنا مالك، عن نافع، عن ابن عمر، عن النبي صلى الله عليه وسلم بمثله‏.‏
hadith.english-text: Narrated `Amr: Abu Nahik was avaricious eater. Ibn `Umar said to him, "Allah's Apostle said, "A Kafir (unbeliever) eats in seven intestines (eats much)." On that Abu Nahik said, "But I believe in Allah and His Apostle ."
